channel.title: Jawbreaker
channel.desc: Three popular high school girls, Courtney, Marcie and Julie, find themselves in serious trouble after Liz suffocates and dies from a jawbreaker.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Night Crew
channel.desc: A group of highly skilled bounty hunters must survive the night in a desert motel. However, soon, they realise that their captive is more than what she seems to be.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Please Stand By
channel.desc: Wendy, a young woman with autism, runs away from her caregiver and embarks on a journey of a lifetime in order to submit her manuscript to a screenwriting competition.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Who Am I
channel.desc: Following the demise of his beloved professor, Bhavataviya, a philosophy student, sets out on a quest to find the answer to the existential question of life.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Vanguard
channel.desc: Qin, an accountant living in the UK, is targeted by the leader of a terrorist organisation. His only hope for survival is Vanguard, an elite security company.
